deemeter.description: this is an average ranking on Deemeter

step3_Help.message: Deemeter is the database YouDeemIt send your vote to. Other users' votes for this page will be averaged out with your one.

step1_helpMsg.message: Click on one of the icons below to have your say.You can give more details, if you wish, in next window.

step1_hpMsg.message: You think content on is:

step1_Help.message: click on one of the icons below, you may give more details in next window

step2_SafeMsg.message: You think is a page of safe content.

step2_ProblematicMsg.message: You think is a page of problematic content.

step2_UnsafeMsg.message: You think is a page of inappropriate content.

step2_Reason.message: If you feel like, give more details (only one main reason):

step2_Extend.message: Extend this vote to the whole website

step2_Ops.message: ops! I changed my mind, bring me back

step3_Thanks.message: Thank you! Your vote was sent to Deemeter

step3_DontShow.message: do not show this window again

step4_AlreadyRated.message: You already assigned a value to this page as well as to the whole domain.

canNotUncheckDomain.message: You already rated this page, but you can rate the whole domain.

canNotCheckDomain.message: You already rated the whole domain, but you can specify a value for this particular page.

extend_Vote.message: if you click, you'll give the same vote to the whole website. You still can give votes to single pages later.
